i love this fanfic so fcking much
summary: "Lucas Lallemant is an ordinary teenager. Good friends, good grades, but something was missing. There was no spark, no...
body:
“Lucas Lallemant is an ordinary teenager. Good friends, good grades, but something was missing. There was no spark, no excitement.

Eliott Demaury is a gang leader. Intimidating, dangerous, he lives his life on the edge. All he wanted was some normality.

When their two worlds collide, a flame is born. But will their love light up the world, or will it crash and burn?”

- “Your Love is Like a Drug, It’s Intoxicating.” (BadBoy!AU by the wonderful @eluhasmyheart or fangirl1005, please read it HERE @AO3! I really love this fanfic! I hope you like this! 😎😘)

Disclaimer: none of the pictures are mine.

summary: I hate that you're receiving hate. 😩Especially because I think you're one of the most entertaining people in the skam fandom. I...
question: I hate that you're receiving hate. 😩Especially because I think you're one of the most entertaining people in the skam fandom. I found your videos really late, ( skam france season 3 had just ended) but I watched them all in one sitting and they definitely made my day. So, just wanted to let you know that you/your content is appreciated. 💕
answer:
Heyyyyy! I remember you from the lives i think (if your un is the same all around hahaha)

Thank you, man. I thought it might have been time that I spoke up about that. Like I can usually let it go. Some of them that I’ve deleted are ridiculous. My IG had one before that was about how I’m an ugly nobody that doesn’t deserve the attention I’m getting from the Skam Fr cast and I was like “lol tru” and I just try to avoid that side of my IG DMs when I can help it.

It sucks coz I wanna talk to as many of you as possible so that we can all fangirl together but then that stuff can get in the way sometimes.

summary: So sorry the toxicity of fandoms is getting to you too. You give us great content, and instead of gratitude you see entitlement...
question: So sorry the toxicity of fandoms is getting to you too. You give us great content, and instead of gratitude you see entitlement of people who are triggered that you aren't reacting in a way they expected to their "superior remake", not understanding people have their own preferences. Hate what this fandom became, but I hope it won't take away the joy of the actual show for you :) Love you, keep being awesome hon <3
answer:
It hasn’t gotten to me too too much, dw 💙 i had a long day plus youtube shit so admittedly i may be a little *small voice* sEnsITive

Lol

But thank you. I think I needed this. And I agree. Putting other fans down is so unnecessary. There are a ton of remakes with different styles. Something for everyone. So this incessant superior remake debate is incredibly pointless.

blog.name: noahcoma
blog.title: Sing my name, pretend it's a song
blog.description: Write drunk, edit [kind of] sober.

summary: hate to say this but I’m kinda underwhelmed by your live yesterday. i don’t know if you were just pissed cause YouTube blocked...
question: hate to say this but I’m kinda underwhelmed by your live yesterday. i don’t know if you were just pissed cause YouTube blocked it but the way you've been talking about druck is just weird. I remember on early episodes you saying David was now your son but now you just seem cold and uninterested towards it? David was outed and you say that was “not fun”? No shit! their reunion yesterday was so important and you just say “aw that was cute” you just sound fake and unbothered. Honestly disappointed
answer:
1. Yes i was pissed that my livestream was disabled. Most people would be? But that’s a separate issue.

2. David is still my son. Adoption papers have been filed.

3. I’m not gonna sit here and argue what I felt against what you “think” I feel simply from watching me through a screen. It’s pointless.

4. I enjoy Druck, I’m entertained by it, and I like David and Matteo as a couple. Is it one of my favorite remakes? No. But I don’t hate it. I made videos for it because it was heavily requested and because it’s a season 3 remake.

5. I think it’s really shit that this kind of toxicity is extended towards other fans like me. Just because someone doesn’t echo your thoughts, doesn’t give you the right to be vicious. I’ve never met you or harmed you personally. I put effort into the content that I produce online for free. What joy the show brings me, you make me feel the exact opposite. And for what? To prove that you’re a better fan? What does that even accomplish? The quality of my content may (and will again) dip here and there but at least I’m not hurting anyone, anon.

This is just one of the few messages that I’ve been receiving recently and it is “not fun”

So anon, whoever you are, whatever it is you’re going through that’s making you as unnecessary as a malignant cyst, I hope it gets better. And to everyone else that’s been setting aside time to shit on me anonymously, get a hobby for fuck’s sake 😂
